Test Piece Contest
Songs of the Sea
Hexham, Northumberland, England, UK 1st prize £12. 2nd prize £8. 3rd prize £6 and 4th prize £4 divided between Murton Colliery and Jarrow Borough. 5th prize £2. March contest 1st £1) Liddlesdale, 2nd (10s.) Jarrow Borough. 8 bands competed.
April 19, 2012, 4:11 p.m. Feb. 2, 2020, 9:22 p.m.
